item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 22, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. PyTorch Internals: Ezyang's Blog (132 points | 11 comments)
2. Map Features in OpenStreetMap with Computer Vision (20 points | discuss)
3. Landrun: Sandbox any Linux process using Landlock, no root or containers (108 points | 21 comments)
4. Show HN: FastOpenAPI – automated docs for many Python frameworks (74 points | 37 comments)
5. Paul A. M. Dirac, Interview by Friedrich Hund (1982) [video] (35 points | 4 comments)
6. Understanding R1-Zero-Like Training: A Critical Perspective (61 points | 8 comments)
7. Differential Geometry: A First Course in Curves and Surfaces [pdf] (54 points | 2 comments)
8. California AG Rob Bonta Urgently Issues Consumer Alert for 23andMe Customers (13 points | discuss)
9. Facebook to stop targeting ads at UK woman after legal fight (63 points | 42 comments)
10. Bra and KET: String Interpolation in AmigaDOS (6 points | discuss)
11. Hubble Captures Vivid Auroras in Jupiter's Atmosphere (16 points | 5 comments)
12. Monster Cables picked the wrong guy to threaten (2008) (467 points | 149 comments)
13. Crabtime: Zig’s Comptime in Rust (347 points | 91 comments)
14. Scallop – A Language for Neurosymbolic Programming (158 points | 44 comments)
15. Locks, leases, fencing tokens, FizzBee (31 points | 6 comments)
16. Blue Ghost lander captures sunset shots on moon before falling silent (38 points | 2 comments)

18. When you deleted /lib on Linux while still connected via SSH (2022) (84 points | 42 comments)
19. The Cybernetic Teammate (17 points | 6 comments)
20. Show HN: AGX – Open-Source Data Exploration for ClickHouse (The New Standard?) (29 points | 2 comments)
21. IETF setting standards for AI preferences (12 points | 3 comments)
22. IronRDP: a Rust implementation of Microsoft's RDP protocol (494 points | 202 comments)
23. Revenge of the Junior Developer (8 points | 4 comments)
24. Use Long Options in Scripts (229 points | 120 comments)
25. NYU Website Hacked (8 points | discuss)
26. Cake is watching you: I built a camera cake (46 points | 13 comments)
27. France rejects backdoor mandate (888 points | 256 comments)
28. ‘Bluey’s World’: How a Cute Aussie Puppy Became a Juggernaut (321 points | 276 comments)
29. Global population datasets underrepresent rural population (200 points | 78 comments)
30. Don't Be Afraid of Types (85 points | 141 comments)
